org.xbib.elasticsearch.common.xcontent
Class XmlXContentFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.xbib.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XmlXContentFactory

public class XmlXContentFactory
extends Object

A one stop to use XContent and XmlXContentBuilder.
